Package org.odpi.egeria.connectors.juxt.xtdb.migration.model

Class UpgradePersistence

java.lang.Object
org.odpi.egeria.connectors.juxt.xtdb.migration.model.UpgradePersistence
Direct Known Subclasses:
Upgrade2To3, UpgradeInitialTo2
public abstract class UpgradePersistence extends Object
Base class that should be extended to define how the persistence layer should be upgraded from one version to another.

  • Constructor Details

    • UpgradePersistence

      protected UpgradePersistence(xtdb.api.IXtdb xtdbAPI, long from, long to, int batchSize)
      Defines the versions that the upgrade will apply.
      Parameters:
      xtdbAPI - the XTDB back-end to upgrade
      from - the version that must be in place to start the upgrade
      to - the version that will be in place once the upgrade is completed
      batchSize - the number of documents to migrate, per batch

      Execute the in-place migration.

    • putToBatch

      protected void putToBatch(xtdb.api.XtdbDocument doc, Date valid, Date txn)
      Add the provided document into the batch as a 'put' operation. This will automatically submit the batch once it reaches the batch size, followed by rolling a new transaction queue.
      Parameters:
      doc - the XTDB document to put
      valid - the valid from date
      txn - the transaction date
